profile:
Our owner has been working in the industry for over 6 years and has worked on projects from small residential renovations to large scale projects like the demolition of the Port Mann Bridge in 2013.

All of our staff are trained and experienced in the removal and disposal of hazardous materials such as lead, asbestos, mould and other hazardous materials. In addition to their current credentials here at TCO we strive to always be advancing our education to stay up to date with the current rules and regulations in our industry.

TCO Environmental is insured and covered by WorkSafeBC so that should the unexpected occur, you can rest easy that no liabililty will fall on you, the customer. 

Our goal is to provide safe, high quality, yet affordable abatement solutions to customers looking to remove and dispose of hazardous materials without the risk of exposure  to themselves  or their loved ones.
name: TCO Environmental

profile:
Moldbusters Environmental welcomes new clients, builders, developers, restoration companies and industry leaders who demand a certain level of quality. We are a well organized group of professionals with a huge emphasis on attention to detail. With over 25 years combined experience in the game, you can be rest assurred this isn't our first rodeo. Our technicians will go to all lengths to ensure your project finishes exactly how you envisioned. Hard work coupled with a no quit attitude will guarantee a swift turnaround at an affordable price. Renovations, restorations, commercial, residential, night work and high profile jobs are our passion.
Experience the difference!

Our team members have worked on TV shows such as “Love It Or List It” Vancouver, Game Of Homes, X-Files and many other TV productions. We've been fortunate to work on projects with Ventana, Onni, Halse Martin, Urban One, Intergulf, Bank Of Montreal, Scotia Bank, School District 36 - Surrey, Vancouver School District 37, Care Centers, Hospitals, YVR Airport, Fairtrade Works,  Crosstown Metal, Gulf Of Georgia Cannery, The Yale, Maynards, My House Build Design, Kenny Gemmill, Dawson Sawyer, Solid General Contractors, Best Built Homes, Adidas, Langara College, UBC, SFU, Tifanny & Co, Starlight Investments, Walmart , Tom Lee Music, Hotel Vancouver, Crofton Manor, Scandinave Spa Whistler, Cool As Moose Whistler, Klondike, Noort Homes, Orr Development, Kare Environmental,  and many more. 
 
Moldbusters, more than just mold.
